column1: WEATHER FORECAST FOR SEA AREAS AROUND THE ISLAND DURING NEXT 24 HOURS
Showers will occur at times in the sea areas off the coast extending from Kankasanthurai to Galle
via  Trincomalee,  Batticaloa  and  Hambantota.  Showers  or  thundershowers  will  occur  at  several
places in the other sea areas around the island in the evening or night.
Winds will be easterly or variable in direction and wind speed will be (15-30) kmph.

T
he sea areas around the island will be slight.
Temporarily strong gusty winds and very rough seas can be expected during thundershowers.
